goal.en: Train students to understand the architecture of computer systems and to learn the performance analysis skills.
goal.ch: 訓練同學對計算機系統架構之了解，並學習系統效能評估方法。

content.en:
週次 內容 備註
1 Course Overview and Basic Computer Architecture
2 Overview of Computer Technology
3 Assembly Language Operation and Operand
4 Instruction Set Overview and Instruction Set Archiecture
5 Instruction Set Architecture and Addressing Modes
6 Data Representation
7 Adder and Multiplier
8 CPU Performance and Its Factors
9 Performance Evaluation and 1st exam.
10 Pipelining Overview
11 Pipeline Hazards and Performance Analysis (1)
12 Pipeline Hazards and Performance Analysis (2)
13 2nd Exam and Cache Memory
14 Cache Memory and Virtual Memory
15 Virtual Memory
16 Control Unit
17 Microprogramming
18 Final Exam.
content.ch:
週次 內容 備註
1 課程概要及基本計算機架構
2 計算機技術發展概述
3 組合語言運算與運算子
4 指令集簡介與指令集架構
5 指令集架構與定址模式
6 資料表示方式
7 加法器與乘法器
8 CPU效能及其影響因素
9 效能評估及第一次考試
10 Pipelining概述
11 Pipelining危障及效能分析 (1)
12 Pipelining危障及效能分析 (2)
13 第二次考試集快取記憶體
14 快取記憶體及虛擬記憶體
15 虛擬記憶體
16 控制單元
17 微程式
18 期末考試
